name: WebCentrix Chat
headline: Integrate a webchat, and interact in real time with your clients through bots or human agents
overview: Integrate to your VTEX IO store, the WebCentrix chat script, that will allow your customers to interact with bots or human agents through chat in real time
features: Chat between human agents and visitors
Automatic attention through a Chat Bot
additionalInformation: This application only works with a VTEX IO store\nYou will need an active WebCentrix account with the active chat channel.
